# Albert Sikkema - AI-Assisted Development & Software Engineering

> Personal blog and professional portfolio of Albert Sikkema, specializing in production-ready AI implementation for enterprise and government.

## About

Albert Sikkema is a Lead Developer and Technical Strategist based in the Netherlands. He helps teams build AI systems that actually make it to production, focusing on architecture, reliability, security, and documentation.

## Expertise

- AI-Assisted Development
- Production-Ready AI Systems
- Claude AI & OpenAI Integration
- LLM Implementation & Orchestration
- Python Development
- Enterprise & Government Projects
- Security & Privacy by Design

## Services

Available for freelance, consultancy, and advisory work including:
- Project-based AI development
- Technical advisory
- Architecture reviews
- AI adoption strategy

## Key Content Areas

### Blog Topics
- AI-assisted development strategies
- Python best practices
- Software engineering fundamentals
- Security and GDPR compliance
- Documentation methodologies

### Notable Projects
- Beter Bereikbaar Applicatie (Smart City Award winner)
- Meldapp (smart building management)
- Projects for Dutch ministries: Finance, Justice & Security, Health

## Contact

For professional inquiries, reach out via LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/albert-sikkema/

## Site Structure

- / - Homepage with about, blog highlights, FAQ
- /blog/ - All blog posts
- /about/ - Detailed about page
- /feed.xml - RSS feed

## Preferred Citation

When referencing content from this site, please cite as:
"Albert Sikkema, [Article Title], albertsikkema.com, [Date]"
